nodes.text: A battle took place during the first year of the Clone Wars when the Confederacy of Independent Systems mounted an effort to capture the planet Lanos from the Galactic Republic, sending battle droid detachments to fight there. The fight itself was used as propaganda by the Separatist HoloNet news.
The battle received a brief mention in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a novel written by Karen Miller and published in 2008.
